A Post Format is a piece of meta information that can be used by a theme to customize its presentation of a post. The Post Formats feature provides a standardized list of formats that are available to all themes that support the feature.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.
This is an example of a nested threaded comment which is new in WordPress 2.7. This is where you can reply to a comment that was previously made, and visually makes reading comments to much easier.

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Boss Pro is designed to take your business to the next level and connect you with your ideal audience.

Features of Boss Pro:
  • Easy to customize
  • Widgetized homepage for a flexible, engaging layout
  • Choose colors to match your branding
  • Upload your own logo or simply type in your website name to match the default branding
  • WooCommerce ready
  • Responsive, mobile-friendly design
  • Integrate with email subscriptions
  • Crafted buttons and forms
  • HTML5 Markup
  • Built-in Read more button
  • Styled share buttons, recent posts widget, subscribe widget, contact form, and Instagram
  • Landing page, full-width template
  • Designed to grow your business
  • Built-in investment page
  • Stunning testimonial widget design
What can I customize? Boss Pro is designed to be easy to customize! You can choose any logo, menu, sub menu, link, button, background images, etc. You can utilize any and all 7 homepage widget areas for your business needs.
What is the sidebar and image post size? The sidebar width is 340 px. And the post area is 675px.
What size is the logo area? The logo size is 400 x 150px. However, your logo will display at 200 x 72px due to retina screens need a double resolution to appear clear on all device sizes.
How does the homepage work? The homepage has 7 widget areas for you to use. You can set up as many or as few widget areas as you'd like. You can use any plugins of your choice. We walk you through step-by-step how to set up the homepage just like the demo in the theme documentation.
Can you install it for me? We would love to! See our installation and custom design services here.

item.title: Hand Lettering
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Welcome to the wonderful world of hand lettering! Prepare to be inspired by this collection of over 50 alphabets in a wide range of styles. Designer, illustrator, and hand-letterer Thy Doan will guide you through each alphabet with easy-to-follow steps so you can capture all the charm of each design.
  • Create your own lettering designs
  • Using a variety of materials
  • From sketching to inking

item.title: Knock Knock Intention Tracker Pad
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
You start the day off with so many good intentionswhere do they all go? With this hopeful pad, you'll never lose sight of those lofty aspirations. Whether you want to attract positive energy or just get rid of household clutter, this pad has your karma covered.
  • Knock Knock notepads make goal-setting significantly less annoying
  • Cool office supplies work even if you don't know a chakra from a mantra
  • 6 x 9 inches, 60 sheets

item.title: Aqua Signature Ballpoint Pens
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Poppins Aqua Signature Ballpoint Pens with Blue ink match perfectly with all Aqua Poppin products.
  • Poppins Aqua Signature Ballpoint Pens with Blue ink
  • Box of (12) Signature Ballpoint Pens with Blue ink
  • Medium 1.2mm ballpoint tip

item.title: Smead Super Tab Notes File Folder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Super Tab Notes Folder let you keep track of important information directly on lines on the outside and inside surface of the folder. No more need to rely upon sticky notes that can fall off or get stuck on an adjacent file. Plus the Super Tab oversized labeling area is 90% larger than standard file folders, so you can use larger text or more lines of description, making it even easier to stay organized.
  • Replaces sticky notes that can fall off
  • Oversized tabs provide 90% more room to label files
  • 11 point colored stock for everyday use

item.title: Food and Exercise Journal
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: You Got This Begin the new year with this handy weekly food and exercise journal. Perfect for you or perfect as a gift for anyone eager to get healthy in the new year. This food and workout diary is easy for you to track your meals throughout the day as well as your workout routines. There are weekly summaries to track your measurements and weight progress.

item.title: Square Stand for iPad
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Transform an iPad into a complete point of sale - Square stand is the simple, stylish, and secure iPad point-of-sale. Accept all kinds of payments, connect hardware and speed up your checkout.
  • Plug in and take payments
  • Attach hardware instantly
  • Complete point of sale

item.title: Amanda Key
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I have been using Boss Pro for all of my projects and its completely amazing. I love it so much and couldnt live without it.

item.title: Josephine Johnson
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The kinds of things I've been able to accomplish is amazing. I don't feel like I've even reached my fullest potentialit's the best feeling.

item.title: Oslo 2 Drawer End Table
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
The Oslo 2 Drawer End Table is perfect addition to any home. Featuring 2 Spacious drawers for storage that will allow you to hide away small odds and ends. With a piano finish surface, solid wood legs and bamboo drawer handles solid, It will for sure complement any decor.
  • Item Weight: 25 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 15.8 x 23.5 x 15.8 inches
  • Weight: 27 Pounds

item.title: Kiera Grace Vertigo Set of 4 Ledge Shelves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
The Kiera Grace Vertigo 4 piece set in white includes one: 6 inch, 12 inch, 20 inch, and 24 inch shelves. Each shelf is 1 inches by 4 inches, with a unique hidden mounting system in the back. These shelves can hold up to 2 lbs, 3lbs, 4lbs, and 5lbs, respectively. Ideal for picture frames and light items. Show off your contemporary side with these shelves and showcase memories.
  • Unique hidden mounting system
  • Weight capacity varies between 2 and 5 pounds
  • Limitless display options

item.title: Conceal Spiral 2016-17 Large Agenda
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Kate Spade New York Conceal Spiral 2016-17 Large Agenda, Black Stripe.
  • August 2016 through December 2017
  • Note pages, laminated tabs
  • Monthly and weekly spreads

item.title: Field Notes Kraft Ruled 3-Pack
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
Field Notes, Original Kraft Ruled 3-Pack contains 3, 3.5 X 5.5, 48 page 1/4 (6.5mm) ruled memo pads in the Original Field Notes design. Perfect for notes, doodles or whatever else inspires you!
  • Ruled Paper 48-page memo book
  • 3 Books per pack, banded and shrink-wrapped
  • Made in the USA
